name: Aleksandr Liukov
profile: Security engineer with 11 years of experience bridging infrastructure operations and security engineering. Core expertise in Kubernetes cluster hardening, CI/CD pipeline security, and Infrastructure as Code automation. Develops security tooling in Python and builds controls directly into development workflows—enabling engineering velocity while maintaining security posture. CISSP and OSCP certified. Currently exploring AI-assisted security operations, developing tools that leverage LLMs for vulnerability triage and code analysis. Advocate for practical, non-blocking security that scales.
workRights: Based in Cyprus. Open to relocation. Requires visa sponsorship.
